word_mean: 饮：一次或连续吞饮的液量。喝饮料

sentence.Network_en: They drink bitter on draught in the local bar.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们在当地的酒吧里喝桶装的苦啤酒。

sentence.Network_en: She lifted the last of her drink to her lips.
sentence.Network_cn: 她将最后一点饮料送到唇边。

sentence.Network_en: She could ring for food and drink, laundry and sundry services.
sentence.Network_cn: 她可以打电话点餐，叫人来取要洗的衣服以及叫其他各种服务。

jx.jx_en_mean: drive a vehicle while under the influence of alcohol
take a large draught or draughts of something

lj.lj_ly: he learnt to &B{drink deep of} the Catholic tradition.
lj.lj_ls: 他学会大量吸收天主教传统。

jx.jx_en_mean: express one's good wishes for someone by raising one's glass and drinking a small amount
celebrate or wish for the good fortune of someone or something by raising one's glass and drinking a small amount
jx.jx_cn_mean: 为祝福…开饮，向…祝酒，为祝贺…而干杯

jx.jx_en_mean: (informal)consume as much alcohol as one's drinking companion without becoming as drunk
jx.jx_cn_mean: (非正式)把…喝到桌子底下去，（比酒量）使…喝醉

jx.jx_en_mean: uttered to express one's agreement with or approval of a statement

lj.lj_ly: we've hit each other before, in drink.
lj.lj_ls: 我们以前在喝醉时干过架。

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English drincan (verb), drinc (noun), of Germanic origin; related to Dutch drinken and German trinken

entry.def: When you drink a liquid, you take it into your mouth and swallow it.

example.ex: He drank his cup of tea...
They'd stopped drinking beer and started on tequila...
example.tran: 他们已经不喝啤酒了,开始喝龙舌兰酒了。

entry.def: To drink means to drink alcohol.

example.ex: He was smoking and drinking too much...
Never accept a ride with people who have been drinking.
example.tran: 千万别搭喝了酒的司机开的车。

entry.def: A drink is an amount of a liquid which you drink.

example.ex: I'll get you a drink of water.

entry.def: A drink is an alcoholic drink.

example.ex: She felt like a drink after a hard day.
example.tran: 辛苦了一天后她想喝上一杯。

entry.tran: 酒(如啤酒、葡萄酒或威士忌)
entry.def: Drink is alcohol, such as beer, wine, or whisky.

example.ex: Too much drink is bad for your health.

entry.tran: 醉得不省人事;烂醉如泥;酩酊大醉
entry.def: If you drink yourself into a stupor or drink yourself into oblivion, you drink so much alcohol that you lose consciousness or fall deeply asleep.

example.ex: We drank ourselves into a stupor on cheap wine.
example.tran: 我们喝廉价葡萄酒喝得酩酊大醉。

entry.tran: 比…更能喝酒;酒量比…大;灌醉
entry.def: If someone drinks you under the table, they drink more alcohol than you are able to on a particular occasion.

example.ex: At sixteen he could drink me under the table.
example.tran: 16 岁的时候他就能把我灌醉了。

entry.def: If someone takes to drink, they start to drink a lot of alcohol regularly, usually because they are depressed or worried about something.

example.ex: He took to drink after his wife died.
example.tran: 他妻子过世后他就沉溺于酒中了。

entry.def: People say 'I'll drink to that' to show that they agree with and approve of something that someone has just said.

means.word_mean: 1. a single serving of a beverage;
2. the act of drinking alcoholic beverages to excess;
4. any large deep body of water;

sentences.sentence: "he jumped into the drink and had to be rescued"
"one swallow of the liquid was enough"
"he took a drink of his beer and smacked his lips"
"The patient must drink several liters each day"

means.word_mean: 4. be fascinated or spell-bound by; pay close attention to;

sentences.sentence: "The mother drinks in every word of her son on the stage"

means.word_mean: 5. drink excessive amounts of alcohol; be an alcoholic;

sentences.sentence: "The husband drinks and beats his wife"

auth_sentence.content: Milk or water is the best drink between meals.
auth_sentence.res_content: Milk or water is the best drink between meals.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Milk or water is the best drink between meals.

auth_sentence.content: Drink two caipirinhas and your hips will start moving.
auth_sentence.res_content: Drink two caipirinhas and your hips will start moving.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Drink two caipirinhas and your hips will start moving.

auth_sentence.content: In addition, we gained share in ready-to-drink tea.
auth_sentence.res_content: In addition, we gained share in ready-to-drink tea.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: In addition, we gained share in ready-to-drink tea.

Sentence.sentence: These make alcohol less easy to get and reduce the number of psychological cues to drink.
Drinking strong alcohol can cause social problems.
To help drivers to give up the habit of drinking
The difference occurs when someone needs to drink.
They do not give up drunk driving.
By drinking water from the Congo River.

sentences.en: I don't drink and I've never played cards.
sentences.cn: 我不喝酒, 也从不打牌。

sentences.en: They are only allowed to sell soft drinks at school.
sentences.cn: 在学校里只准许他们出售不含酒精的饮料。

sentences.en: He likes a drink when he returns home from work.
sentences.cn: 他喜欢下班回家后喝一杯酒。

jushi.english: He is the only person in the room who had been drinking heavily.
jushi.chinese: 房间里就他一个人,他刚喝过很多酒。
